name: Demastered HZD: First Watcher Tutorial Demo
name_original: Demastered HZD: First Watcher Tutorial Demo
description:
I wanted to see how hard it would be to make an open world game that has a lot of unique mechanics on a heavily limited engine. My goal was for the main goal of this tutorial to be clear like in the original game. This is not a complete remake of the original. I took story, art and mechanic liberties to shape this game to the Bitsy engine. I would love to hear feedback and I hope you enjoy playing!

CONTROLS:

W - Up

A - Left

S - Down

D - Right

*Any button to continue dialogue*

TABLET/MOBILE:

Swipe to move

Click to continue dialogue
